content: This account is perfect for anyone who needs to receive/process credit or debit cards payments via a USA processor and gateway. The account includes an attached and fully KYC verified Square Business checking account which gives instant access to funds from sales. Also, includes a VCC card that will allow you to instantly use or transfer funds via Wise or similar methods. Easy integration with Shopify and Woocommerce. These accounts are made with our information, not hacked or stolen and as such come with a 30 day warranty. I have 6 accounts and can give a discount if ordering more then 1 account.*Selfie verified*Drivers license Verified*SSN verified*EIN verified*Full access USA bank account *Instant payouts activated*Online checkout activated*Virtual POS activated*Online invoicing activated*VCC card included*30 day replacement warranty$60Crypto/Escrow Skype: live:.cid.61c857c3f46a174fDiscord: apexaccounts1182068228504166567
